Sec. 33-163.5. Common open space and amenities.
A minimum of 500 net square feet shall be devoted to common open space for each proposed dwelling unit in the villa development. Such open space shall be comprised of playgrounds, recreation areas, landscaped parks or greenways, as included in the site plan approval, but shall not include the required landscaped perimeter buffer areas, parking courts, streets, utility, service or accessory business areas, or lake, lagoon or canal areas. Such common open space is to be so located that the different areas of the villa development will be logically and conveniently served and benefited by such open space.
